snippet: Erik Helland, who worked for the Chicago Bulls for 25 years, has used a program called Metrifit to closely monitor players’ diets, sleep patterns and exercise regimens.
abstract: Wisconsin men's basketball strength and conditioning coach Erik Helland, who is busy preparing team for NCAA tournament semifinals against Kentucky, uses app called Metrifit to closely monitor players' diets, sleep patterns and exercise regimens.
lead_paragraph: Erik Helland, who worked for the Chicago Bulls for 25 years, has used a program called Metrifit to closely monitor players’ diets, sleep patterns and exercise regimens.

headline.main: A Strength Coach for Wisconsin Uses an App That Works More Than Thumb Muscles
headline.print_headline: A Strength Coach Uses an App That Works More Than Thumb Muscles
